MWC.GUI.Canvas.Swing

Class SwingCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • MWC.GUI.Canvas.Swing.SwingCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, CanvasType, Editable

    public class SwingCanvas
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements CanvasType, Editable
    Swing implementation of a canvas.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
